data.actual_result: The green box marking where the channel will go is moved further down the further down the channel list you go
data.expected_result: The green box marking where the channel will go should be underneath the channel right below it in both spots on the list
data.short_description: When sorting channels, the sorting gets more inaccurate the further down the list you go
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you can manage channels - Make sure you have multiple channels and/or categories (I have about 60 channels and over 10 categories) - Go into channel settings, and click sort text channels - Hold down on a channel at the top of the list, and move it down slightly without letting go - Observe the position of the green box that marks where the channel will be placed - Put the channel back where it was previously, and scroll down to about the bottom of the list - Hold down on a channel near the bottom of the list, and move it slightly downwards without letting go - Observe the location of the green box that marks where the channel will be placed
